00035 void DisplayArea::xSetup()
00036 {
00037   //DAVID Set Background   
00038   setPaletteBackgroundColor(QColor(0,0,0));
00039    
00040   Browser =new MyBrowser(this);
00041   Browser->view()->setGeometry(0,0,800,600);
00042   Browser->hide();
00043   
00044   //DAVID Clock  
00045   Clock =new hdassClock(this);
00046   Clock->setGeometry(0,0,800,520);
00047   Clock->hide();
00048   
00049   
00050    //Set the Album
00051   Album=new ImageDetial(this,"Album");
00052   Album->setGeometry(0,0,800,520);
00053   Album->hide();
00054   
00055   //DAVID InfoArea
00056   
00057   IA=new InfoArea(this,"IA");
00058   IA->setGeometry(0,0,800,520);
00059   IA->hide();
00060   
00061   Media =new mediamanagement(this,"mediamanagement");
00062   Media->setGeometry(20,20,750,500);
00063   Media->hide();
00064     
00065   slotDisplayModeChange(GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE);
00066  // KeyBoaed_Key *key=new KeyBoaed_Key(this);
00067  // key->setGeometry(0,0,54,54);
00068 //  key-show();
00069 }
00070 
00071 void DisplayArea::slotDisplayModeChange(int displaymode)
00072 {
00073    
00074   if(displaymode==em_display_internet)
00075   {
00076     Browser->show();
00077     Clock->hide();
00078     Album->hide();
00079     IA->hide();
00080     Media->hide();
00081   }
00082   if(displaymode==em_display_player)
00083   {
00084     Browser->hide();
00085     Clock->hide();
00086     Album->hide();
00087     IA->show();
00088     Media->hide();
00089   }
00090   if(displaymode==em_display_management)
00091   {
00092     Browser->hide();
00093     Clock->hide();
00094     Album->hide();
00095     IA->hide();
00096     Media->show();
00097   }
00098   if(displaymode==em_display_album)
00099   {
00100     Browser->hide();
00101     Clock->hide();
00102     Album->show();
00103     IA->hide();
00104     Media->hide();
00105   }
00106   if(displaymode==em_display_clock)
00107   {
00108     Browser->hide();
00109     Clock->show();
00110     Album->hide();
00111     IA->hide();
00112     Media->hide();
00113   }
00114   if(displaymode==em_display_setting)
00115   {
00116     Browser->hide();
00117     Clock->hide();
00118     Album->hide();
00119     IA->hide();
00120     Media->hide();
00121   }
00122   if(displaymode==em_display_close)
00123   {
00124     Browser->hide();
00125     Clock->hide();
00126     Album->hide();
00127     IA->hide();
00128     Media->hide();
00129   }
00130   
00131 }
